item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below are for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE POWER WINDOW REGULATOR MASTER SWITCH ASSEMBLY WITH FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL LH (w/ Power Window, for Driver Side)

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the connector and remove the power window regulator master switch assembly with front door armrest base panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE POWER WINDOW REGULATOR SWITCH ASSEMBLY WITH FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL RH (w/ Power Window, for Front Passenger Side)

s2.ptxt: Using moulding remover A, detach the 2 clips and 8 claws.
Disconnect the connector and remove the power window regulator switch assembly with front upper armrest base panel RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT UPPER ARMREST BASE PANEL LH (w/o Power Window)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 2 clips and 8 claws and remove the front upper armrest base panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY (w/o Power Window)

s2.ptxt: Insert a clip remover between the plate and front door trim board.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the clip remover tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Turn the handle clockwise to remove the snap ring, front door window regulator handle and plate.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT DOOR LOWER FRAME BRACKET GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Detach the 3 clips and remove the front door lower frame bracket garnish.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT DOOR TRIM BOARD SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Detach the 9 clips and remove the front door trim board.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT NO. 2 SPEAKER ASSEMBLY (w/ Front No. 2 Speaker)

s2.ptxt: Remove the nut and front No. 2 speaker assembly.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE OUTER REAR VIEW MIRROR ASSEMBLY LH

s3.ptxt: Push down the claw and remove the outer rear view mirror assembly LH.
Push down the claw and remove the outer rear view mirror assembly LH.
